content: mini muffin hat a crocheted baby hat by sophia kessinger for this pattern you will need yarn oddments of dk or light worsted yarn held doubled throughout you ll need at least 2 colors the examples pictured used katia diana crochet hook size k removable stitch marker specs gauge 3 single_crochet = 1 size for a baby head circumference up to 15 terms chain = chain st = stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch pm = place marker single_crochet = single crochet *to* = repeat the pattern chain 4 slip_stitch to first chain to form a loop round 1 pm on loop currently on hook to show the beginning of the round 6 single_crochet in ring round 2 pm work 2 single_crochet in each st around round 3 pm *1 single_crochet in the next st 2 single_crochet in the following st* around round 4 pm *1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in the following st* around round 5 pm *1 single_crochet in the next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in the following st* around round 6 pm *1 single_crochet in the next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in the following st* around round 7 pm *1 single_crochet in the next 5 sts 2 single_crochet in the following st* around round 8 pm 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around then slip_stitch to the first single_crochet of this round cut yarn and fasten_off there should be 42 sts total from here on join new color to the st to the left of the st just fastened off round 9 pm chain 1 *single_crochet into the space one row below the next st single_crochet into the following st* around ending with single_crochet into the space one row below slip_stitch to chain 1 round 10 pm chain 1 1 single_crochet in each st around rnds 11-14 repeat round 10 end round 14 with a slip_stitch to chain 1 work the sl st using a new color round 15 pm chain 1 *single_crochet into the space 2 row below the next st single_crochet in the following st* around ending with single_crochet in into the space 2 row below sl st to chain 1 when working the single_crochet s into the space 2 row below make sure you don t crochet too tightly otherwise your work will pucker round 16 pm chain 1 single_crochet in each st around rnds 17& 18 repeat round 16 ending with a slip_stitch to the chain 1 cut yarn and fasten_off round 19 attach new color pm single_crochet in each st around rnds 20-23 pm single_crochet in the back loop only of each st around add pompom or tassel if desired pattern& images © 2008 sophia kessinger
